text: Khabaradara! Tumhi te loka ahata ki allahacya margata kharca karanyasathi bolavile jatata, tevha tumacyapaiki kahi jana kanjusapana karu lagatata ani jo kanjusapana karato, to nihsansaya svatahsica kanjusapana karato. Sarvasrestha allaha nihsprha ahe ani tumhi garajavanta ahata, ani jara tumhi tonda phiravinare vhala tara to tumacya jagi, tumacyakherija dusarya lokanna anila je maga tumacyasarakhe nasatila
